for today. Slide right or left to hear each one.

. Please wait until the requested web page is been loaded.

Delete call logs. Slide right to confirm.

Contact name. Slide right to input.

Phone number. Slide right to input.
Now you are at the delete contact menu
Contacts. Slide right or left to hear each one.

Now you are at the contact list menu

The contact was deleted and now you are at the contact list menu

Send a message to selected contact
Now you are at the contacts menu
The contact was created and now you are at the contacts menu

Now you are at the input text mode using the standard android keyboard with Talkback. You must have talkBack enabled in order to use this method. A textbox is selected right now and the standard android keyboard is available at the bottom of the screen. Write what you want and press the enter key in the keyboard to enter the data. Press the back button to cancel and go back to the previous menu.
The text field is now empty

Now you are at the input text mode by using the physical keyboard or the touchscreen. If you will use the touchscreen, slide up and down to select a character or key, slide right to confirm character or key and move to the next one and slide left to delete the last character.

Input text mode

* Slide up and down to select character

* Slide right to confirm character or key and move to the next one

* Slide left to delete the last character

* Physical keyboard compatible
Cancel and go back to the previous menu
No possible results. Please, try again or check if the voice recognition on your device requires an Internet connection. If so, check your Internet connection status.
First you must select a result
Now you are at the input text mode using voice recognition menu
. Slide right to hear each one
Voice recognition. Slide right and then speak
System Error. Voice recognition can\'t be executed
Now you are at the main menu
Addressee. Slide right or left to hear each contact.
ERROR. You must complete every field in order to send a message.
Message. Slide right to input message.
Now you are at the compose message menu
Your message is being sent, please wait...
The message could not be send, check your carrier status and try again later.
Now you are at the delete message menu
Delete all received messages. Slide right to confirm.
Now you are at the delete all received messages menu
First you must select a message
Inbox. Slide right or left to hear each message.
Now you are at the inbox messages menu
The message was sent and now you are at the inbox messages menu
The message was deleted and now you are at the inbox messages menu
All received messages were deleted successfully and now you are at the inbox messages menu
Please try again in a few moments when all the inbox messages has been processed.
Now you are at the messages menu
The message was sent and now you are at the messages menu
Delete all sent messages. Slide right to confirm.
Now you are at the delete all sent messages menu
First you must select a message
Now you are at the sent messages menu
The message was deleted and now you are at the sent messages menu
All sent messages were deleted successfully and now you are at the sent messages menu
Sent messages. Slide right or left to hear each message.
Please try again in a few moments when all the sent messages has been processed.
Albums. Slide right or left to hear each one.
First you must select an artist.
Artists. Slide right or left to hear each one.
Now you are at the artists menu
First you must select an album.

Please try again in a few moments when the music player has filtered all the artist albums.

Now you are at the music player menu

standard android keyboard with Talkback. Talkback must be activated.
voice recognition. May require an Internet connection.

Now you are at the settings menu

Blind Communicator Privacy Policy. Released on Dec 21, 2016. I, Leonardo Javier Russo, regard your information significant and release this Privacy Statement to inform you what information I collect and how I use it to personalize and continually improve you experience. This Privacy Statement applies to the App Blind Communicator and its services and does not apply to the product or service that which does not link to this statement or has its privacy statement respectively. 1 - Collecting information. a. Personal Information. I do not collect Personal Information. Personal Information is information that identifies you or another person, such as your first name and last name, physical addresses, email addresses, telephone, fax, camera, microphone, GPS, or any information stored within your device. b. Non-personal Information. I do not collect your non-personal information when you are using the App Blind Communicator or visiting my Website, including your device information, operation system, logs. c. Information you provide. I do not collect your information when you communicate with me. How I Use Information. a. Personal Information. I do not store Personal Information and therefore I do not disclose your Personal Information. b. Non-Personal Information. I do not sell, trade, or otherwise transfer to outside parties your information. I do not combine Non-Personal Information with Personal Information (such as combining your name with your unique User Device number). Contact Me. If you have any questions or comments about this Policy or our privacy practices, or to report any violations of the Policy or abuse of the App Blind Communicator or the Website, please contact me at contacto@lrusso.com.ar. Changes. This Privacy Policy may change which will not reduce your rights under this Privacy Policy from time to time, I will post any privacy policy changes on this page, so please review it periodically. If you do not agree to any modifications to this Policy, your could immediately stop all use of all the Services. Your continued use of the App Blind Communicator following the posting of any modifications to this Policy will constitute your acceptance of the revised Policy.

Press Back again to close the App.

Welcome to the Blind Communicator system developed by Leonardo Javier Russo. Slide up and down to browse between options and slide right to choose the selected item. If your device has a physical keyboard, you can use the directional keys. If you are using TalkBack, slide and select menus using two fingers.
